article: One day Mozart saw an old blind street-performer playing the violin in the street corner  _  a hat in front of him . He found out the old man was  _  one of his compositions . The old man played for  some time  but still nobody put any money into his hat . Mozart asked the old man , "Do you often play compositions by Mozart ?" "Yes,  Sir  ," answered the old man . "now, everybody knows Mozart and likes his music ." "Do you  _  a living by playing the violin ?" The old man said he  _  . Mozart took over the violin from the old man and began to play . He played so well  _  all the passerby stopped to listen to the wonderful music and soon the old man felt very  _  that the man could play so well . He asked Mozart , "Who are you , sir ?" "Your colleague , a poor  _  like you ." Then Mozart gave the  _  back to the old man and went away .
